author: DistroTube
description:
Today, I'm taking a quick first look at the recently released Netrunner 25, codenamed "Shockworm". Netrunner is a Debian-based Linux distro that uses the KDE Plasma desktop.

REFERENCED:
► https://www.netrunner.com/
